price: 38. Wax maqli ogaa oo arki ogaa Maalinta la keenayo Hortayada! Daalimiintu se  maanta waxay ku sugan yihiin habow cad.
arabic: أَسۡمِعۡ بِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصِرۡ يَوۡمَ يَأۡتُونَنَا لَٰكِنِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: asmiʿ bihim wa-abṣir yawma yatūnanā lākini al-ẓālimūna al-yawma fī ḍalālin mubīnin
